rules_text:
Doom deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
Reconstruct {3}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)[/i]
You may cast Doom from exile by paying {4}{B}{B}{B} rather than its mana cost. If you do, shuffle it into your library instead of putting it anywhere else as it resolves.
flavor_text: [i]A few dead, more gone, the rest well on their way.[/i]
